item.title: Ice Cube’s ‘War of the Worlds’: What the Critics Are Saying
item.description: Rich Lee’s film has gone viral online for its negative reviews, notably previously boasting a zero percent score on Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: ‘War of the Worlds’ Review: Ice Cube Headlines a Disastrous Movie Retelling of H.G. Wells’ Alien Invasion Classic
item.description: In 1938, Orson Welles hosted a radio version of H.G. Wells’ “War of the Worlds” that reportedly sent listeners into a panic by treating the alien invasion as a breaking news broadcast. Skip forward to
